name: discord-movienight
excerpt: A Discord bot in Java that manages a 'to-watch' list of movies, fetching data from the OMDB API and integrating ChatGPT for user interactions and generating remarks about planned movies.
description:
Discord Movienight

A discord bot written in Java, using Javacord & Maven.
Bot that keeps 'to-watch' list of movies that a discord server wants to watch.
Movie-data is received from the OMDB Api and stored in .json files, both per server and in a cache file for recently called movie-data.

ChatGPT integration using sashirestela's simple-openai library to allow users to talk to the bot, who pretends to be Adam Sandler. Also used to generate some custom remarks about planned movies & etc.
